text:
You have to download the preview release and then I had to use the Vive tool. I
had to get a machine to build 19045.3757 
But here they are to make it easier if your org doesn't mind random adml and
admx files from the web. 
https://www.askwoody.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/WindowsCopilot.adml

https://www.askwoody.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/WindowsCopilot.admx
 
Oh and the icon is to the right of the system tray on 10 
[cid:217e1ade-5a62-407b-98a6-58f2441e5474]

metadata.topic: Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of Copilot
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of Copilot
metadata.email_text_original:
You have to download the preview release and then I had to use the Vive tool.  I
had to get a machine to build 19045.3757 
But here they are to make it easier if your org doesn't mind random adml and
admx files from the web. 
https://www.askwoody.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/WindowsCopilot.adml
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.askwoody.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F11%2FWindowsCopilot.adml&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cb6ff7c54d4164acb210a08dbeac7b965%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638361915758878285%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Xxb7wgsoRHGMnfIvqvQskSPh%2BlBoP%2B7nldgrP8mqM8c%3D&reserved=0]

[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.askwoody.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F11%2FWindowsCopilot.admx&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cb6ff7c54d4164acb210a08dbeac7b965%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638361915758878285%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2BhjpY97jRzbIzRMCxcGii3dXxZtI1x9egEfzwXMJQow%3D&reserved=0] 
Oh and the icon is to the right of the system tray on 10
